revised_title: Skeletal Secretion and Structure in Living and Fossil Bryozoa
tldr: The study examines the secretion and structure of the skeleton in living and fossil Bryozoa, focusing on the zooecium and its components. The research investigates the mineral and organic parts of the exoskeleton, providing insights into the evolutionary changes in Bryozoa's calcareous exoskeleton throughout their phyletic history.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Bryozoology
